channel.title: Francis Liardet on In No Particular Order

item.title: Creating a Hydroponic Sensor Suite with ESP32
item.author: Francis Liardet
item.description:
Francis Liardet

It’s me

Unreal Engine-based video game developer since 2015. Spend my free time adding to my ever-growing eclectic selection of hobbies and projects.

Created this blog in 2025 to hopefully share something useful, and to act as a diary of sorts so I don’t lose track of anything.

If you’ve made it this far, have money burning a hole in your pocket, and want to support my endless hunger for cheap electronics, feel free to buy me a coffee.
